doc:
Pierre Rochefort https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Rochefort 0 Pierre Rochefort (born 1981) is a French actor and singer. He is the son of Jean Rochefort and Nicole Garcia. At the age of five, he appeared in the 1986 short film 15 août which was directed by his mother. In 2005, he made his foray into music and founded his own record label "Homworkz". More recently, he has appeared in television, stage and film productions, including the film Going Away, for which he won the award for Male Revelation at the 2014 Cabourg Film Festival. Pierre_Rochefort ( born 1981 ) is a_French_actor_and_singer . He is the_son of Jean_Rochefort and Nicole_Garcia . At the_age of five , he appeared in the_1986_short_film_15_août which was_directed by his_mother . In 2005 , he made his_foray into music and founded his_own_record_label_"_Homworkz_" . More_recently , he has_appeared in television_,_stage_and_film_productions , including the_film Going Away , for which he won the_award for Male_Revelation at the_2014_Cabourg_Film_Festival .
